short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button for trailers to Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of googling Netflix Trailers? This extension helps you find the trailer by just one click! Our Extension adds a little button to Netflix which will redirect you to the Youtube trailer.
